   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: ct_testspec_2_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description:
   25: %%% Test test specifications
   26: %%%
   27: %%% The suites used for the test are located in the data directory.
   28: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -module(ct_testspec_2_SUITE).
   30: 
   31: -compile(export_all).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: -include_lib("common_test/src/ct_util.hrl").
   35: 
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: %% TEST SERVER CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: 
   40: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   41:     Config.
   42: 
   43: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   44:     ok.
   45: 
   46: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: %% suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   53: 
   54: all() -> 
   55:     [basic_compatible_no_nodes,
   56:      basic_compatible_nodes,
   57:      unknown_terms,
   58:      no_merging,
   59:      multiple_specs,
   60:      misc_config_terms,
   61:      define_names_1].
   62: 
   63: 
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: %% VALID TEST SPEC TERMS (R15B02):
   66: %%
   67: %% {node,3}
   68: %% {cover,2}
   69: %% {cover,3}
   70: %% {config,2}
   71: %% {config,3}
   72: %% {config,4}
   73: %% {userconfig,2}
   74: %% {userconfig,3}
   75: %% {alias,3}
   76: %% {merge_tests,2}
   77: %% {logdir,2}
   78: %% {logdir,3}
   79: %% {logopts,2}
   80: %% {logopts,3}
   81: %% {basic_html,2}
   82: %% {basic_html,3}
   83: %% {verbosity,2}
   84: %% {verbosity,3}
   85: %% {silent_connections,2}
   86: %% {silent_connections,3}
   87: %% {label,2}
   88: %% {label,3}
   89: %% {event_handler,2}
   90: %% {event_handler,3}
   91: %% {event_handler,4}
   92: %% {ct_hooks,2}
   93: %% {ct_hooks,3}
   94: %% {enable_builtin_hooks,2}
   95: %% {release_shell,2}
   96: %% {multiply_timetraps,2}
   97: %% {multiply_timetraps,3}
   98: %% {scale_timetraps,2}
   99: %% {scale_timetraps,3}
  100: %% {include,2}
  101: %% {include,3}
  102: %% {auto_compile,2}
  103: %% {auto_compile,3}
  104: %% {stylesheet,2}
  105: %% {stylesheet,3}
  106: %% {suites,3}
  107: %% {suites,4}
  108: %% {groups,4}
  109: %% {groups,5}
  110: %% {groups,6}
  111: %% {cases,4}
  112: %% {cases,5}
  113: %% {skip_suites,4}
  114: %% {skip_suites,5}
  115: %% {skip_groups,5}
  116: %% {skip_groups,6}
  117: %% {skip_groups,7}
  118: %% {skip_cases,5}
  119: %% {skip_cases,6}
  120: %% {create_priv_dir,2}
  121: %%
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: 
  124: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  125: %% TEST CASES
  126: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  127: 
  128: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  129: %%%
  130: basic_compatible_no_nodes(_Config) ->
  131: 
  132:     AliasDir1 = "../tests/to1",
  133:     AliasDir2 = "../tests/to2",
  134:     CfgDir1 = "../cfgs/to1/x.cfg",
  135:     CfgDir2 = ["../cfgs/to2/x.cfg","../cfgs/to2/y.cfg"],
  136:     LogDir = "../logs",
  137:     IncludeDir1 = "../../include",
  138:     IncludeDir2 = ["../tests/to1/include","../tests/to2/include"],
  139: 
  140:     Spec =
  141: 	[
  142: 	 {label,"basic_compatible_no_nodes"},
  143: 	 {alias,to1,AliasDir1},
  144: 	 {alias,to2,AliasDir2},
  145: 	 {config,CfgDir1},
  146: 	 {config,CfgDir2},
  147: 	 {userconfig,{?MODULE,"cfg_str1"}},
  148: 	 {userconfig,{?MODULE,"cfg_str2"}},
  149: 	 {logdir,LogDir},
  150: 	 {logopts,[no_nl]},
  151: 	 {event_handler,evh1,[1]},
  152: 	 {event_handler,[evh2,evh3],[[2,3]]},
  153: 	 {ct_hooks,[{cth_mod1,[]}]},
  154: 	 {ct_hooks,[{cth_mod2,[]}]},
  155: 	 {multiply_timetraps,2},
  156: 	 {include,IncludeDir1},
  157: 	 {include,IncludeDir2},
  158: 	 {suites,to1,[x_SUITE]},
  159: 	 {groups,to1,y_SUITE,[g1,g2]},
  160: 	 {cases,to1,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2]},
  161: 	 {skip_suites,to1,z_SUITE,"skipped"},
  162: 	 {suites,to2,[x_SUITE,y_SUITE]},
  163: 	 {skip_groups,to2,x_SUITE,[g1,g2],"skipped"},
  164: 	 {skip_cases,to2,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2],"skipped"}
  165: 	],
  166:     
  167:     {ok,SpecDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  168:     
  169:     ListResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec, false),
  170:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM LIST:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(ListResult)]),	
  171:     SpecFile = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec,SpecDir,
  172: 					      "basic_compatible_no_nodes.spec"),
  173:     FileResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_file([SpecFile], false),
  174:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM FILE:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(FileResult)]),
  175:     
  176:     Node = node(),
  177:     LogDirV = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"../logs")),
  178:     Alias1V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,AliasDir1)),
  179:     Alias2V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,AliasDir2)),
  180:     CFGs = [{Node,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir))} ||
  181: 	       CfgDir <- [CfgDir1 | CfgDir2]],
  182:     Incls = [{Node,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,IncludeDir))} ||
  183: 		IncludeDir <- [IncludeDir1 | IncludeDir2]],
  184:     
  185:     Verify = #testspec{spec_dir = SpecDir,
  186: 		       nodes = [{undefined,Node}],
  187: 		       init = [],
  188: 		       label = [{Node,"basic_compatible_no_nodes"}],
  189: 		       logdir = [{Node,LogDirV},"."],
  190: 		       logopts = [{Node,[no_nl]}],
  191: 		       basic_html = [],
  192: 		       cover = [],
  193: 		       config = CFGs,
  194: 		       userconfig = [{Node,{?MODULE,"cfg_str1"}},
  195: 				     {Node,{?MODULE,"cfg_str2"}}],
  196: 		       event_handler = [{Node,evh1,[1]},
  197: 					{Node,evh2,[[2,3]]},
  198: 					{Node,evh3,[[2,3]]}],
  199: 		       ct_hooks = [{Node,{cth_mod1,[]}},
  200: 				   {Node,{cth_mod2,[]}}],
  201: 		       enable_builtin_hooks = true,
  202: 		       release_shell = false,
  203: 		       include = Incls,
  204: 		       auto_compile = [],
  205: 		       stylesheet = [],
  206: 		       multiply_timetraps = [{Node,2}],
  207: 		       scale_timetraps = [],
  208: 		       create_priv_dir = [],
  209: 		       alias = [{to1,Alias1V},{to2,Alias2V}],			
  210: 		       tests = [{{Node,Alias1V},
  211: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all]},
  212: 				  {y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all},tc1,tc2]},
  213: 				  {z_SUITE,[{all,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]},
  214: 				{{Node,Alias2V},
  215: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all,
  216: 					    {{g1,all},{skip,"skipped"}},
  217: 					    {{g2,all},{skip,"skipped"}}]},
  218: 				  {y_SUITE,[all,
  219: 					    {tc1,{skip,"skipped"}},
  220: 					    {tc2,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]}],
  221: 		       merge_tests = true},
  222: 
  223:     verify_result(Verify,ListResult,FileResult),
  224: 
  225:     {ok,Tests} = ct_testspec:get_tests([SpecFile]),
  226:     ct:pal("ct_testspec:get_tests/1:~n~p~n", [Tests]),
  227:     [{[SpecFile],[{Node,Run,Skip}]}] = Tests,
  228:     [{Alias1V,x_SUITE,all},
  229:      {Alias1V,y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all},tc1,tc2]},
  230:      {Alias1V,z_SUITE,all},
  231:      {Alias2V,x_SUITE,all},
  232:      {Alias2V,y_SUITE,all}] = lists:sort(Run),
  233:     [{Alias1V,z_SUITE,"skipped"},
  234:      {Alias2V,x_SUITE,{g1,all},"skipped"},
  235:      {Alias2V,x_SUITE,{g2,all},"skipped"},
  236:      {Alias2V,y_SUITE,tc1,"skipped"},
  237:      {Alias2V,y_SUITE,tc2,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip),
  238: 
  239:     ok.
  240: 
  241: 
  242: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  243: %%%
  244: basic_compatible_nodes(_Config) ->
  245: 
  246:     Node1 = node1@host1,
  247:     Node2 = node2@host2,
  248:     TODir1 = "../tests/to1",
  249:     TODir2 = "../tests/to2",
  250:     CfgDir1 = "../cfgs/to1/x.cfg",
  251:     CfgDir2 = ["../cfgs/to2/x.cfg","../cfgs/to2/y.cfg"],
  252:     LogDir = "../logs",
  253:     MasterLogDir = "../master_logs",
  254:     IncludeDir1 = "../../include",
  255:     IncludeDir2 = ["../tests/to1/include","../tests/to2/include"],
  256: 
  257:     Spec =
  258: 	[
  259: 	 {node,n1,Node1},
  260: 	 {node,n2,Node2},
  261: 	 {init,[n1],[{node_start,[{callback_module,cbm}]}]},
  262: 	 {init,n2,[{node_start,[]}]},
  263: 	 {init,all_nodes,{eval,{mod,func,[]}}},
  264: 	 {label,"basic_compatible_nodes"},
  265: 	 {label,n1,basic_compatible_nodes_1},
  266: 	 {config,n1,CfgDir1},
  267: 	 {config,n2,CfgDir2},
  268: 	 {userconfig,{?MODULE,"cfg_str1"}},
  269: 	 {userconfig,{?MODULE,"cfg_str2"}},
  270: 	 {logdir,all_nodes,LogDir},
  271: 	 {logdir,master,MasterLogDir},
  272: 	 {logopts,node2@host2,[no_nl]},
  273: 	 {event_handler,master,evh1,[1]},
  274: 	 {event_handler,[n1,n2],[evh2,evh3],[[2,3]]},
  275: 	 {ct_hooks,all_nodes,[{cth_mod1,[]}]},
  276: 	 {ct_hooks,[{cth_mod2,[]}]},
  277: 	 {multiply_timetraps,node1@host1,2},
  278: 	 {include,n1,IncludeDir1},
  279: 	 {include,[n1,n2],IncludeDir2},
  280: 	 {suites,n1,TODir1,[x_SUITE]},
  281: 	 {groups,n1,TODir1,y_SUITE,[g1,g2]},
  282: 	 {cases,n1,TODir1,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2]},
  283: 	 {skip_suites,n1,TODir1,z_SUITE,"skipped"},
  284: 	 {suites,n2,TODir2,[x_SUITE,y_SUITE]},
  285: 	 {skip_groups,n2,TODir2,x_SUITE,[g1,g2],"skipped"},
  286: 	 {skip_cases,n2,TODir2,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2],"skipped"}
  287: 	],
  288:     
  289:     {ok,SpecDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  290:     
  291:     ListResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec, false),
  292:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM LIST:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(ListResult)]),	
  293:     SpecFile = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec,SpecDir,
  294: 					      "basic_compatible_nodes.spec"),
  295:     FileResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_file([SpecFile], false),
  296:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM FILE:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(FileResult)]),
  297:     
  298:     Node = node(),
  299:     LogDirV = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"../logs")),
  300:     MasterLogDirV = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"../master_logs")),
  301:     TO1V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir1)),
  302:     TO2V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir2)),
  303:     CFGs = [{Node1,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir1))} |
  304: 	    [{Node2,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir))} || CfgDir <- CfgDir2]],
  305:     Incls = [{Node1,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,IncludeDir1))} |
  306: 	     [{Node1,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,IncludeDir))} ||
  307: 		 IncludeDir <- IncludeDir2] ++
  308: 	     [{Node2,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,IncludeDir))} ||
  309: 		 IncludeDir <- IncludeDir2]],
  310:     
  311:     Verify = #testspec{spec_dir = SpecDir,
  312: 		       nodes = [{undefined,Node},{n1,Node1},{n2,Node2}],
  313: 		       init = [{Node1,[{node_start,[{callback_module,cbm}]},
  314: 				       {eval,[{mod,func,[]}]}]},
  315: 			       {Node2,[{node_start,[{callback_module,ct_slave}]},
  316: 				       {eval,[{mod,func,[]}]}]},
  317: 			       {Node,[{node_start,[]},
  318: 				      {eval,[{mod,func,[]}]}]}],
  319: 		       label = [{Node,"basic_compatible_nodes"},
  320: 				{Node2,"basic_compatible_nodes"},
  321: 				{Node1,basic_compatible_nodes_1}],
  322: 		       logdir = [{Node,LogDirV},{Node1,LogDirV},{Node2,LogDirV},
  323: 				 {master,MasterLogDirV},"."],
  324: 		       logopts = [{Node2,[no_nl]}],
  325: 		       basic_html = [],
  326: 		       cover = [],
  327: 		       config = CFGs,
  328: 		       userconfig = [{Node,{?MODULE,"cfg_str1"}},
  329: 				     {Node1,{?MODULE,"cfg_str1"}},
  330: 				     {Node2,{?MODULE,"cfg_str1"}},
  331: 				     {Node,{?MODULE,"cfg_str2"}},
  332: 				     {Node1,{?MODULE,"cfg_str2"}},
  333: 				     {Node2,{?MODULE,"cfg_str2"}}],
  334: 		       event_handler = [{master,evh1,[1]},
  335: 					{Node1,evh2,[[2,3]]},
  336: 					{Node1,evh3,[[2,3]]},
  337: 					{Node2,evh2,[[2,3]]},
  338: 					{Node2,evh3,[[2,3]]}],
  339: 		       ct_hooks = [{Node,{cth_mod1,[]}},
  340: 				   {Node1,{cth_mod1,[]}},
  341: 				   {Node2,{cth_mod1,[]}},
  342: 				   {Node,{cth_mod2,[]}},
  343: 				   {Node1,{cth_mod2,[]}},
  344: 				   {Node2,{cth_mod2,[]}}],
  345: 		       enable_builtin_hooks = true,
  346: 		       release_shell = false,
  347: 		       include = Incls,
  348: 		       auto_compile = [],
  349: 		       stylesheet = [],
  350: 		       multiply_timetraps = [{Node1,2}],
  351: 		       scale_timetraps = [],
  352: 		       create_priv_dir = [],
  353: 		       tests = [{{Node1,TO1V},
  354: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all]},
  355: 				  {y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all},tc1,tc2]},
  356: 				  {z_SUITE,[{all,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]},
  357: 				{{Node2,TO2V},
  358: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all,
  359: 					    {{g1,all},{skip,"skipped"}},
  360: 					    {{g2,all},{skip,"skipped"}}]},
  361: 				  {y_SUITE,[all,
  362: 					    {tc1,{skip,"skipped"}},
  363: 					    {tc2,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]}],
  364: 		       merge_tests = true},
  365: 
  366:     verify_result(Verify,ListResult,FileResult),
  367: 
  368:     {ok,Tests} = ct_testspec:get_tests([SpecFile]),
  369:     ct:pal("ct_testspec:get_tests/1:~n~p~n", [Tests]),
  370:     [{[SpecFile],[{Node,[],[]},
  371:                   {Node1,Run1,Skip1},
  372:                   {Node2,Run2,Skip2}]}] = Tests,
  373:     [{TO1V,x_SUITE,all},
  374:      {TO1V,y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all},tc1,tc2]},
  375:      {TO1V,z_SUITE,all}] = lists:sort(Run1),
  376:     [{TO2V,x_SUITE,all},
  377:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,all}] = lists:sort(Run2),
  378:     [{TO1V,z_SUITE,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip1),
  379:     [{TO2V,x_SUITE,{g1,all},"skipped"},
  380:      {TO2V,x_SUITE,{g2,all},"skipped"},
  381:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,tc1,"skipped"},
  382:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,tc2,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip2),
  383: 
  384:     ok.
  385: 
  386: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  387: %%%
  388: unknown_terms(Config) ->
  389:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  390: 
  391:     Spec1 = [{suites,PrivDir,all},
  392: 	     {userdata,"I've got news for you"}],
  393:     {error,{undefined_term_in_spec,{userdata,_}}} =
  394: 	(catch ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec1, false)),
  395:     true = is_record(ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec1, true),
  396: 		      testspec),
  397:     
  398:     Spec2 = [{logdir,{logdir,PrivDir}}],
  399:     {error,{invalid_directory_name,_}} =
  400: 	(catch ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec2, false)),
  401:     
  402:     Spec3 = [{suite,PrivDir,all}],
  403:     {error,{undefined_term_in_spec,{suite,_,_}}} =
  404: 	(catch ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec3, false)),
  405:     true = is_record(ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec3, true), testspec),
  406:     
  407:     Spec4 = [{suites,PrivDir,all},
  408: 	     {skip_suites,PrivDir,x_SUITE}],
  409:     {error,{bad_term_in_spec,{skip_suites,_,_}}} =
  410: 	(catch ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec4, false)),
  411:     {error,{bad_term_in_spec,{skip_suites,_,_}}} =
  412: 	(catch ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec4, true)),
  413: 
  414:     Spec5 = [{configs,all_nodes,PrivDir}],
  415:     {error,{undefined_term_in_spec,{configs,_,_}}} =
  416: 	(catch ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec5, false)),
  417:     true = is_record(ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec5, true), testspec),
  418:   
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  422: %%%
  423: no_merging(_Config) ->    
  424:     Node1 = node1@host1,
  425:     Node2 = node2@host2,
  426:     TODir1 = "../tests/to1",
  427:     TODir2 = "../tests/to2",
  428:     Spec =
  429: 	[
  430: 	 {merge_tests,false},
  431: 	 {node,n1,Node1},
  432: 	 {node,n2,Node2},
  433: 	 {suites,n1,TODir1,[x_SUITE]},
  434: 	 {groups,n1,TODir1,y_SUITE,[g1,g2]},
  435: 	 {cases,n1,TODir1,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2]},
  436: 	 {skip_suites,n1,TODir1,z_SUITE,"skipped"},
  437: 	 {suites,n2,TODir2,[x_SUITE,y_SUITE]},
  438: 	 {skip_groups,n2,TODir2,x_SUITE,[g1,g2],"skipped"},
  439: 	 {skip_cases,n2,TODir2,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2],"skipped"}
  440: 	],
  441:     
  442:     {ok,SpecDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  443:     
  444:     ListResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec, false),
  445:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM LIST:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(ListResult)]),	
  446:     SpecFile = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec,SpecDir,
  447: 					      "no_merging.spec"),
  448:     FileResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_file([SpecFile], false),
  449:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM FILE:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(FileResult)]),
  450:     
  451:     Node = node(),
  452:     TO1V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir1)),
  453:     TO2V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir2)),
  454:     
  455:     Verify = #testspec{merge_tests = false,
  456: 		       spec_dir = SpecDir,
  457: 		       nodes = [{undefined,Node},{n1,Node1},{n2,Node2}],
  458: 		       tests = [{{Node1,TO1V},
  459: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all]}]},
  460: 				{{Node1,TO1V},
  461: 				 [{y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all}]}]},
  462: 				{{Node1,TO1V},
  463: 				 [{y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2]}]},
  464: 				{{Node1,TO1V},
  465: 				 [{z_SUITE,[{all,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]},
  466: 				{{Node2,TO2V},
  467: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all]}]},
  468: 				{{Node2,TO2V},
  469: 				 [{y_SUITE,[all]}]},
  470: 				{{Node2,TO2V},
  471: 				 [{x_SUITE,[{{g1,all},{skip,"skipped"}},
  472: 					    {{g2,all},{skip,"skipped"}}]}]},
  473: 				{{Node2,TO2V},
  474: 				 [{y_SUITE,[{tc1,{skip,"skipped"}},
  475: 					    {tc2,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]}]},
  476: 		       
  477:     verify_result(Verify,ListResult,FileResult),
  478: 
  479:     {ok,Tests} = ct_testspec:get_tests([SpecFile]),
  480:     ct:pal("ct_testspec:get_tests/1:~n~p~n", [Tests]),
  481:     [{[SpecFile],[{Node,[],[]},
  482:                   {Node1,Run1,Skip1},
  483:                   {Node2,Run2,Skip2}]}] = Tests,
  484:     [{TO1V,x_SUITE,all},
  485:      {TO1V,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2]},
  486:      {TO1V,y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all}]},
  487:      {TO1V,z_SUITE,all}] = lists:sort(Run1),
  488:     [{TO2V,x_SUITE,all},
  489:      {TO2V,x_SUITE,[{skipped,g1,all},{skipped,g2,all}]},
  490:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,all},
  491:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,[{skipped,tc1},{skipped,tc2}]}] = lists:sort(Run2),
  492:     [{TO1V,z_SUITE,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip1),
  493:     [{TO2V,x_SUITE,{g1,all},"skipped"},
  494:      {TO2V,x_SUITE,{g2,all},"skipped"},
  495:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,tc1,"skipped"},
  496:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,tc2,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip2),
  497: 
  498:     ok.
  499: 
  500: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  501: %%%
  502: multiple_specs(_Config) ->
  503:     Node1 = node1@host1,
  504:     Node2 = node2@host2,
  505:     TODir1 = "../tests/to1",
  506:     TODir2 = "../tests/to2",
  507:     CfgDir1 = "../cfgs/to1/x.cfg",
  508:     CfgDir2 = ["../cfgs/to2/x.cfg","../cfgs/to2/y.cfg"],
  509:     LogDir = "../logs",
  510:     Spec1 =
  511: 	[
  512: 	 {node,n1,Node1},
  513: 	 {node,n2,Node2},
  514: 	 {alias,to1,TODir1},
  515: 	 {alias,to2,TODir2},
  516: 	 {label,"multiple_specs1"},
  517: 	 {config,n1,CfgDir1},
  518: 	 {config,n2,CfgDir2},
  519: 	 {logdir,all_nodes,LogDir}
  520: 	],
  521:     Spec2 =
  522: 	[
  523: 	 {merge_tests,false},
  524: 	 {label,"multiple_specs2"},
  525: 	 {suites,n1,TODir1,[x_SUITE]},
  526: 	 {groups,n1,TODir1,y_SUITE,[g1,g2]},
  527: 	 {cases,n1,TODir1,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2]},
  528: 	 {skip_suites,n1,TODir1,z_SUITE,"skipped"},
  529: 	 {suites,n2,TODir2,[x_SUITE,y_SUITE]},
  530: 	 {skip_groups,n2,TODir2,x_SUITE,[g1,g2],"skipped"},
  531: 	 {skip_cases,n2,TODir2,y_SUITE,[tc1,tc2],"skipped"}
  532: 	],
  533:     
  534:     {ok,SpecDir} = file:get_cwd(),    
  535:     SpecFile1 = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec1,SpecDir,
  536: 					      "multiple_specs.1.spec"),
  537:     SpecFile2 = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec2,SpecDir,
  538: 					      "multiple_specs.2.spec"),
  539:     FileResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_file([[SpecFile1,SpecFile2]],
  540: 						     false),
  541:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM FILE:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(FileResult)]),
  542:     
  543:     Node = node(),
  544:     TO1V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir1)),
  545:     TO2V = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir2)),
  546:     CFGs = [{Node1,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir1))} |
  547: 	    [{Node2,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir))} || CfgDir <- CfgDir2]],
  548:     LogDirV = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"../logs")),
  549: 
  550:     Verify = #testspec{merge_tests = true,
  551: 		       spec_dir = SpecDir,
  552: 		       nodes = [{undefined,Node},{n1,Node1},{n2,Node2}],
  553: 		       alias = [{to1,TO1V},{to2,TO2V}],
  554: 		       label = [{Node,"multiple_specs1"},
  555: 				{Node1,"multiple_specs1"},
  556: 				{Node2,"multiple_specs1"}],
  557: 		       logdir = [{Node,LogDirV},{Node1,LogDirV},{Node2,LogDirV},"."],
  558: 		       config = CFGs,
  559: 		       tests = [{{Node1,TO1V},
  560: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all]},
  561: 				  {y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all},tc1,tc2]},
  562: 				  {z_SUITE,[{all,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]},
  563: 				{{Node2,TO2V},
  564: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all,{{g1,all},{skip,"skipped"}},
  565: 					    {{g2,all},{skip,"skipped"}}]},
  566: 				  {y_SUITE,[all,{tc1,{skip,"skipped"}},
  567: 					    {tc2,{skip,"skipped"}}]}]}]},
  568: 		       
  569:     verify_result(Verify,FileResult,FileResult),
  570: 
  571:     {ok,Tests} = ct_testspec:get_tests([[SpecFile1,SpecFile2]]),
  572:     ct:pal("ct_testspec:get_tests/1:~n~p~n", [Tests]),
  573:     [{[SpecFile1,SpecFile2],[{Node,[],[]},
  574:                              {Node1,Run1,Skip1},
  575:                              {Node2,Run2,Skip2}]}] = Tests,
  576:     [{TO1V,x_SUITE,all},
  577:      {TO1V,y_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all},tc1,tc2]},
  578:      {TO1V,z_SUITE,all}] = lists:sort(Run1),
  579:     [{TO2V,x_SUITE,all},
  580:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,all}] = lists:sort(Run2),
  581:     [{TO1V,z_SUITE,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip1),
  582:     [{TO2V,x_SUITE,{g1,all},"skipped"},
  583:      {TO2V,x_SUITE,{g2,all},"skipped"},
  584:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,tc1,"skipped"},
  585:      {TO2V,y_SUITE,tc2,"skipped"}] = lists:sort(Skip2),
  586: 
  587:     ok.
  588: 
  589: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  590: %%% 
  591: misc_config_terms(_Config) ->
  592:     CfgDir = "../cfgs/to1",
  593:     TODir = "../tests/to1",
  594:     Spec =
  595: 	[{node,x,n1@h1},{node,y,n2@h2},
  596: 
  597: 	 {config,CfgDir,"a.cfg"},
  598: 	 {config,n1@h1,CfgDir,"b.cfg"},
  599: 	 {config,all_nodes,CfgDir,"c.cfg"},
  600: 	 {config,all_nodes,filename:join(CfgDir,"d.cfg")},
  601: 
  602: 	 {basic_html,true},
  603: 	 {basic_html,n1@h1,false},
  604: 	 {basic_html,n2@h2,true},
  605: 	 
  606: 	 {silent_connections,n1@h1,all},
  607: 	 {silent_connections,n2@h2,[ssh]},
  608: 
  609: 	 {enable_builtin_hooks,false},
  610: 
  611: 	 {release_shell,true},
  612: 
  613: 	 {auto_compile,false},
  614: 	 {auto_compile,n1@h1,true},
  615: 	 {auto_compile,n2@h2,false},
  616: 
  617: 	 {stylesheet,"../css"},
  618: 	 {stylesheet,n1@h1,"./n1/css"},
  619: 	 {stylesheet,n2@h2,"./n2/css"},
  620: 
  621: 	 {create_priv_dir,[auto_per_tc]},
  622: 	 {create_priv_dir,n1@h1,[manual_per_tc]},
  623: 	 {create_priv_dir,n2@h2,[auto_per_run]},
  624: 
  625: 	 {suites,n1@h1,TODir,[x_SUITE]}
  626: 	],
  627:     
  628:     {ok,SpecDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  629:     
  630:     ListResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec, false),
  631:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM LIST:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(ListResult)]),	
  632:     SpecFile = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec,SpecDir,
  633: 					      "misc_config_terms.spec"),
  634:     FileResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_file([SpecFile], false),
  635:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM FILE:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(FileResult)]),
  636:     
  637:     Node = node(),
  638:     CfgA = get_absdir(filename:join(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir), "a.cfg")),
  639:     CfgB = get_absdir(filename:join(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir), "b.cfg")),
  640:     CfgC = get_absdir(filename:join(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir), "c.cfg")),
  641:     CfgD = get_absdir(filename:join(filename:join(SpecDir,CfgDir), "d.cfg")),
  642:     CSS = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"../css")),
  643:     CSS1 = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"./n1/css")),
  644:     CSS2 = get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,"./n2/css")),
  645:     
  646:     Verify = #testspec{spec_dir = SpecDir,
  647: 		       nodes = [{undefined,Node},{x,n1@h1},{y,n2@h2}],
  648: 		       basic_html = [{Node,true},{n1@h1,false},{n2@h2,true}],
  649: 		       silent_connections = [{n1@h1,[all]},{n2@h2,[ssh]}],
  650: 		       config = [{Node,CfgA},
  651: 				 {n1@h1,CfgA},
  652: 				 {n2@h2,CfgA},
  653: 				 {n1@h1,CfgB},
  654: 				 {Node,CfgC},
  655: 				 {n1@h1,CfgC},
  656: 				 {n2@h2,CfgC},
  657: 				 {Node,CfgD},
  658: 				 {n1@h1,CfgD},
  659: 				 {n2@h2,CfgD}],
  660: 		       enable_builtin_hooks = false,
  661: 		       release_shell = true,
  662: 		       auto_compile = [{Node,false},
  663: 				       {n1@h1,true},
  664: 				       {n2@h2,false}],
  665: 		       stylesheet = [{Node,CSS},
  666: 				     {n1@h1,CSS1},
  667: 				     {n2@h2,CSS2}],	       
  668: 		       create_priv_dir = [{Node,[auto_per_tc]},
  669: 					  {n1@h1,[manual_per_tc]},
  670: 					  {n2@h2,[auto_per_run]}],
  671: 		       tests = [{{n1@h1,get_absdir(filename:join(SpecDir,TODir))},
  672: 				 [{x_SUITE,[all]}]}]
  673: 		      },
  674:     
  675:     verify_result(Verify,ListResult,FileResult).
  676: 
  677: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  678: %%% 
  679: define_names_1(_Config) ->
  680:     Spec =
  681: 	[
  682: 	 {define,'HOST','eniac'},
  683: 	 {define,'NODE1',testnode1},
  684: 	 {define,'NODE2',testnode2},
  685: 	 {define,'NODES',['NODE1@HOST',
  686: 			  'NODE2@HOST']},
  687: 	 {define,'TOPDIR',".."},
  688: 	 {define,'TO1',"to1"},
  689: 	 {define,'TO2',"to2"},
  690: 	 {define,'LOGDIR',"'TOPDIR'/logdir"},
  691: 	 {define,'LOGDIR1',"'TOPDIR'/logdir1"},
  692: 	 {define,'LOGDIR2',"'TOPDIR'/logdir2"},
  693: 	 {define,'CFGDIR',"'TOPDIR'/cfgs"},
  694: 	 {define,'CFGFILES',["cfgX","cfgY"]},
  695: 	 {define,'TESTDIR',"'TOPDIR'/test"},
  696: 	 {define,'TO1DIR',"'TESTDIR'/'TO1'"},
  697: 	 {define,'TO2DIR',"'TESTDIR'/'TO2'"},
  698: 	 {define,'EXSUITE',ex_SUITE},
  699: 	 {define,'EXGRS',[g1,g2]},
  700: 
  701: 	 {logdir,'LOGDIR'},
  702: 	 {logdir,'NODE1@HOST','LOGDIR1'},
  703: 	 {logdir,'NODE2@HOST','LOGDIR2'},
  704: 
  705: 	 {config,["a.cfg","b.cfg"]},
  706: 	 {config,'NODES',"./'CFGDIR'/c.cfg"},
  707: 	 {config,'CFGDIR',["d.cfg","e.cfg"]},
  708: 	 {config,'NODE2@HOST','CFGDIR','CFGFILES'},
  709: 
  710: 	 {suites,'NODE1@HOST','TO1DIR',all},
  711: 	 {suites,'NODES','TO2DIR',all},
  712: 
  713: 	 {groups,'TO1DIR','EXSUITE','EXGRS'}
  714: 	],
  715:     
  716:     {ok,SpecDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  717:     
  718:     ListResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_list(Spec, false),
  719:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM LIST:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(ListResult)]),	
  720:     SpecFile = ct_test_support:write_testspec(Spec,SpecDir,
  721: 					      "define_names_1.spec"),
  722:     FileResult = ct_testspec:collect_tests_from_file([SpecFile], false),
  723:     ct:pal("TESTSPEC RECORD FROM FILE:~n~p~n", [rec2proplist(FileResult)]),
  724:     
  725:     N = node(),
  726:     N1 = testnode1@eniac,
  727:     N2 = testnode2@eniac,
  728:     Join = fun(Dir) -> shorten_path(filename:join(SpecDir,Dir),SpecDir) end,
  729: 
  730:     Verify = #testspec{spec_dir = SpecDir,
  731: 		       nodes = [{undefined,N2},
  732: 				{undefined,N1},
  733: 				{undefined,N}],
  734: 		       config = [{N2,Join("a.cfg")},{N2,Join("b.cfg")},
  735: 				 {N1,Join("a.cfg")},{N1,Join("b.cfg")},
  736: 				 {N,Join("a.cfg")},{N,Join("b.cfg")},
  737: 				 {N1,Join("../cfgs/c.cfg")},{N2,Join("../cfgs/c.cfg")},
  738: 				 {N2,Join("../cfgs/d.cfg")},{N2,Join("../cfgs/e.cfg")},
  739: 				 {N1,Join("../cfgs/d.cfg")},{N1,Join("../cfgs/e.cfg")},
  740: 				 {N,Join("../cfgs/d.cfg")},{N,Join("../cfgs/e.cfg")},
  741: 				 {N2,Join("../cfgs/cfgX")},{N2,Join("../cfgs/cfgY")}],
  742: 		       logdir = [{N,Join("../logdir")},
  743: 				 {N1,Join("../logdir1")},
  744: 				 {N2,Join("../logdir2")},
  745: 				 "."],
  746: 		       tests = [{{N1,Join("../test/to1")},[{all,[all]}]},
  747: 				{{N1,Join("../test/to2")},[{all,[all]}]},
  748: 				{{N2,Join("../test/to2")},[{all,[all]}]},
  749: 				{{N2,Join("../test/to1")},
  750: 				 [{ex_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all}]}]},
  751: 				{{N,Join("../test/to1")},
  752: 				 [{ex_SUITE,[{g1,all},{g2,all}]}]}]
  753: 		      },    
  754:     verify_result(Verify,ListResult,FileResult).
  755: 
  756: 
  757: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  758: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
  759: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  760: 
  761: verify_result(VerificationRec,ListResult,FileResult) ->
  762:     {_,TSLTuples} = rec2proplist(ListResult),
  763:     {_,TSFTuples} = rec2proplist(FileResult),
  764:     {_,VTuples} = rec2proplist(VerificationRec),    
  765:     VResult =
  766: 	(catch lists:foldl(fun({Tag,Val},{[{Tag,Val}|TSL],[{Tag,Val}|TSF]}) ->
  767: 				   {TSL,TSF};
  768: 			      ({Tag,Val},{[{_Tag,TSLVal}|_TSL],[{Tag,Val}|_TSF]}) ->
  769: 				   exit({ts_list_mismatch,Tag,Val,TSLVal});
  770: 			      ({Tag,Val},{[{Tag,Val}|_TSL],[{_Tag,TSFVal}|_TSF]}) ->
  771: 				   exit({ts_file_mismatch,Tag,Val,TSFVal});
  772: 			      ({Tag,Val},{_,[{_Tag,TSFVal}|_TSF]}) ->
  773: 				   exit({ts_mismatch,Tag,Val,TSFVal})
  774: 			   end, {TSLTuples,TSFTuples}, VTuples)),
  775: 	       case VResult of
  776: 		  {'EXIT',Reason} ->
  777: 		      ct:fail(Reason);
  778: 		  _ ->
  779: 		      ok
  780: 	       end,
  781:     ok.
  782: 
  783: 
  784: check_parameter(S="cfg_str1") ->
  785:     {ok,{config,S}};
  786: check_parameter(S="cfg_str2") ->
  787:     {ok,{config,S}}.
  788: read_config(S) ->
  789:     {ok,[{cfg,S}]}.
  790: 
  791: rec2proplist(E={error,_What}) ->
  792:     exit({invalid_testspec_record,E});
  793: rec2proplist([{Specs,Rec}]) when is_list(Specs) ->
  794:     rec2proplist(Rec);
  795: rec2proplist(Rec) ->
  796:     [RecName|RecList] = tuple_to_list(Rec),
  797:     FieldNames = 
  798: 	if RecName == testspec ->
  799: 		record_info(fields, testspec);
  800: 	   true ->
  801: 		undefined
  802: 	end,
  803:     {RecName,combine_names_and_vals(FieldNames,RecList)}.
  804: 
  805: combine_names_and_vals([FN|FNs], [V|Vs]) ->
  806:     [{FN,V} | combine_names_and_vals(FNs, Vs)];
  807: combine_names_and_vals([], []) ->
  808:     [];
  809: combine_names_and_vals(_, _) ->
  810:     [].
  811: 
  812: get_absdir(Dir) ->
  813:     shorten_path(filename:absname(Dir),Dir).
  814: 
  815: shorten_path(Path,SpecDir) ->
  816:     case shorten_split_path(filename:split(Path),[]) of
  817: 	[] ->
  818: 	    [Root|_] = filename:split(SpecDir),
  819: 	    Root;
  820: 	Short ->	    
  821: 	    filename:join(Short)
  822:     end.
  823: 
  824: shorten_split_path([".."|Path],SoFar) ->
  825:     shorten_split_path(Path,tl(SoFar));
  826: shorten_split_path(["."|Path],SoFar) ->
  827:     shorten_split_path(Path,SoFar);
  828: shorten_split_path([Dir|Path],SoFar) ->
  829:     shorten_split_path(Path,[Dir|SoFar]);
  830: shorten_split_path([],SoFar) ->
  831:     lists:reverse(SoFar).
